parameters: My former teacher always said that fire is first of all a necessary
element of life, and only then a weapon of destruction.
That's why he's not my teacher anymore.
Redhead, are you sure you don't need my help?
No, no, no! There's no way I'm going to ask such an ugly girl out on
Hey! Don't you know you can't say that to a girl?
By "inside" I mean under the clothes, of course.
Don't believe me? Want me to prove it?
Better take this redhead to Maiya first.
Era, thank you for your help!
Yeah, thank you for hiring such scarecrows.
I need the key to the gold chest with the Salamander
Ah, yes. I forgot. I've got it with me, here.
Find the key to the chest

He's talking about me, don't mind him.
Better take this redhead to Maiya first.
Better take this redhead to Maiya first.
I'd like to work for an Alchemist, too!
Such big ears. I'm surrounded by freaks!
Unless you have a death wish we'd better go.
I have to admit, the Alchemist can make an impression. And I found
something I've been looking for! Good thing I stopped by!
If you want to be attractive to guys, you need to lose some weight
And grow some breasts! You're as flat as a guy!
That's it, you pissed me off! Have a death wish?!
I'm sensing a strange spell on this guy.
Yes, exactly, that's the whole point. Someone put a spell on him to
Look, his emotions give him away and he nervously gesticulates. And
he twitches when he starts talking.
And her nose! Look at her nose! The horror!
You’re very lucky, I can help you with this.
Yes! I agree!!! Her nose is huge!
My sacred fire spell will cleanse you from the curse.
No, no, no, her legs aren't nice. They're crooked!!!
No? Don't want to? You sure? Well, good luck then.
...Yes, now I see something's wrong with him, too...
I'll go ask Maiya if she can help, she's a magician, she

If you only knew what I've been through!
This time she said that all the girls except her would shy away from
